name: The Linking At the Laboratory
description:
The Linking At The Laboratory

The Linking At The Laboratory is a game about a scientist who's colleagues were sucked into a hadron collider. Can you get all 3 pieces of metal to make a key, and turn off the marvel turned rogue?

Controls

W/Space/Up: Jump
A/D/Left/Right: Move

Known Bugs

Since this game was made in a game jam, there is bound to be bugs. Currently we are aware of:

  • Needed to jump to move in the second room in the game
  • The possibility that in the second key chamber a fast enemy can force you into the wall.
Credits

Made by:

  • Lewis Page
  • Empower Animations

For the GMTK 2021 game jam.
